keyword: how many calories in mozzarella cheese
title: How Many Calories in Mozzarella Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in mozzarella cheese per 100 g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Mozzarella Cheese?
assumptions: Part-skim milk mozzarella cheese, low-moisture variety, shredded or block form; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type (whole vs. skim), brand, moisture content, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of part-skim mozzarella cheese contains about 254 kcal and 24 g protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts panels for quick reference and comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g mozzarella cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 254 kcal for part-skim mozzarella cheese.

faqs.q: Is mozzarella cheese high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 100 g provides about 24 g of protein, making it a good source.

faqs.q: How much fat is in mozzarella cheese?
faqs.a: Around 16 g total fat per 100 g, with 10 g saturated fat.
Very lowâ€”only 2.2 g carbs and 0 g fiber per 100 g.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in mozzarella?
faqs.a: About 627 mg per 100 g, which can vary by brand and type.
